title: Bicycles down the years
creator_credit: Jeff Spencer, David Ferris and Victoria. Ministry of Education
brief_description: An introduction to the history of the bicycle, looking at some of the technical and social changes in the past one hundred and twenty years. Bill Sidebottom and Doug McCann from Museum of Victoria present a collection of vintage and veteran bicycles to tell the story.
creator_credit_for_label: Jeff Spencer, David Ferris and Victoria. Ministry of Education
